country: native_name = Banū al-Aghlab (بنو الأغلب) |conventional_long_name = Aghlabid dynasty |common_name = Aghlabid  |continent=Africa |region = North Africa
status: Semi-independent emirate, nominally vassal or subject of the Abbasid, but de facto independent since 801.
leader1: Ibrahim I ibn al-Aghlab ibn Salim
leader2: Abu Mudhar Ziyadat Allah III ibn Abdallah
